EmailTemplate.name: EGPWS - Additional information required
EmailTemplate.subject: Terrain Database - Additional information required {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
In order to update your Terrain registration profile, can you please, provide the following Aircraft Information:
•Aircraft Tail number •Aircraft Serial number •Date of Aircraft Purchase
Thanks for your kind cooperation.
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Data Services
Account Management Representative(AMR)
email: dsa@honeywell.com
Phone: 602-436-6739, option 5
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
